attributes.action: Revert to 'Stay at Home, Protect the NHS, Save Lives' to stop ambiguity
attributes.additional_details: We need absolute clarity in the messaging being given to the public. Any room for ambiguity will see cases of Covid 19 rise again.
attributes.background: The new slogan, 'Stay Alert' is not clear guidance for England. Citizens are already breaching lockdown and putting our NHS frontline staff and other members of the public at high risk. Revert to 'Stay at Home, Protect the NHS, Save Lives' to keep us all safe.
